	<head>
		<title>Best in Britain: Blighty TV</title>
		<meta name="description" content="Blighty unashamedly celebrates all that is great, unique and inspirational about Britain today. Packed with programmes that explore the complexity, irony, contradictory and definitely quirky traits of modern Britain, Blighty revels in what makes the country brilliant." />
		<meta name="keywords" content="Blighty, Blighty TV, Blighty channel" />
		<link href="http://uktv.co.uk/favicons/blighty.ico" rel="shortcut icon" />

							<div id="logo">
								<p><img src="/images/blighty/blighty-brand.gif" width="214" height="214" border="0" alt="Blighty" title="Blighty" /></p>
							</div>
							<div id="message">
								<p>It's been a blast!</p>
								<p>But unfortunately, Blighty has now closed down.</p>
								<p>If you would like to watch incredible wildlife, history and other factual programming like the ones we were so proud to show, please head over to <a href="http://edentv.co.uk/" target="_blank">Eden</a> (Sky 532 &amp; Virgin 208) or <a href="http://yesterdaytv.co.uk/" target="_blank">Yesterday</a> (Freeview 19, Sky 537 &amp; Virgin 203).</p>
								<p>Thanks</p>
							</div>
						</div>
